segments.text: Looking at this kitchen drawing, it's oddly charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is methodically drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron make her look so domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the water is pouring over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in the puddle without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's climbing to snag cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn't look stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might tumble down with the plate in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's peaceful out there compared to here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long until it all unravels.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could be a funny story later.
segments.speaker: PAR
